name: Dear Love (The NFT) - QueenEarth
description:
If we are fortunate to spend time with the ones we love, 2020/2021 has been a chapter when I learned to cherish it the most. #howdyouliketospendtoday


The lyric video NFT is also on #tezos - https://kalamint.io/token/27751



lyrics


Dear love

How’d you like to spend today?

I wiped my schedule clean

Meetings got erased

Dear love

Order up some food

No dishes in the sink

how ‘d you like to spend today



Windows open

Service

The neighbors

Think we pray

How’d you like to

Spend today



How’d you like to spend today

Dear love



Dear love

Can’t say that I’ve ever felt this way

So loved

So safe

And you give me the same

This love

Baby it’s the best I’ve ever made

And since it’s only getting better

Let’s just focus and create



I know what you’ll say

If I ask you babe

I know what you’ll say

When I ask you babe

How you wanna

spend today?

How you wanna

How you wanna

How you wanna spend today?

Dear love



Dear love

Can’t say that I’ve ever felt this way

How you wanna spend today?

Dear love

It you answer “nothing”

That’s okay

cus

I just wanna spend today

With you

With you

Dear love

How’d you like to spend today?

Dear love


credits

from Queer Core: Behind the Music, released November 27, 2020
